about_the_game:
After long years living far from home, Nelson Santana, a fractured and lost individual, decides to return to his homeland seeking for answers about his past. What he didn't anticipated was to find out he is the only soul alive in that city.

Where is everyone? Father... Mother? Anyone?!


Immerse yourself into the deepest memories of a man who lost control of his own life... Survive the silent chaos of a city that swallowed whole everyone who lived in it. Now it's 23 hours and 37 minutes... The clock is ticking, and everything is repeating once again.



In HOMELESS, Nelson Santana will step into a very personal journey that will lead him once again to a peaceful city in the country side of Brazil. Decrepit and abandoned, you must recollect yourself and investigate the clues of a mistery that goes beyond the human pysche.

But, just like you, Nelson will cross paths with other that have also been called by the city, and looks as confused as you. The few fragments left of your remaining memories tells you that they are, somehow, tied to you. You don't remember them, don't recognize their faces, but understand that something summons you... Summons everyone. And its getting worse.



HOMELESS turns the city of Santa Cecília a living organism in this open world horror game. Explore different locations of a dense urban environment and gather the pieces of your memory in a quest to understand why everything you believed once to be real changed overnight and is just nothing like it now.

There is an untold story in every corner of Santa Cecília and, in order to reveal your past, the player shall plunge in a world of bizarre religious cults, conspirations, abuses and violence while running and hiding from the manifestations of a city that seems to be alive.





During your adventure you won't be alone. HOMELESS features a cast of characters that is also seeking something. Everyone have something to hide, even if they do not know about it.

Survive this endless nightmare and face the secrets of Santa Cecília in a hell that will try to engulf your soul and everyone who steps on it.

content_descriptors.notes: 'Homeless' explores sensitive themes including but not limited to suicide, substance abuse and sexual abuse. Players are advised to approach the game with discretion, mindful of the potentially distressing content. It is recommended for mature audiences who are comfortable engaging with such themes. Once again, viewer discretion is advised.

  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Processor: Intel Core i7

short_description: Live the story of Nelson Santana, a man who returns to his homeland seeking his own past. Face your biggest fears in this journey of psychological horror set in the country side of Brazil.Survive the deafening silence...Welcome to Santa Cecília.
